title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.3 - Projects subject to review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.3 - Projects subject to review

State Regulations

Any project, unless exempted from review under section
9500.4, 9500.6
(b), 9500.7
(b) or
9500.10
of
this Part, undertaken by a project sponsor, shall be subject to review if it is
in the jurisdictional area of the commission, and which: (a) might destroy or substantially impair
significant scenic, historic, recreational, ecological, conservational or
natural resources; or
(b) might
bring about a significant change in the appearance or use of the water in the

St. Lawrence River or eastern Lake Ontario or in the surrounding
land. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9500.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
